title: Installation issue: pexsi+fortran

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
Hi, I'm having the problem when installing cp2k where it requires pexsi+fortran. I found "spack install pexsi" went well though. Any help would be appreciated.

---

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install pexsi+fortran
```
